verses.verse: <S%H2142>Remember<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, what is come upon <S%H5027>us<s%>: consider, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> our <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.
Our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H2114>strangers<s%>, our <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H5237>aliens<s%>.
We are <S%H3490>orphans<s%> and <S%H369>fatherless<s%>, our <S%H517>mothers<s%> are as <S%H490>widows<s%>.
We have <S%H8354>drunken<s%> our <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>; our <S%H6086>wood<s%> is sold unto <S%H935>us<s%>.
Our <S%H6677>necks<s%> are under <S%H7291>persecution<s%>: we <S%H3021>labor<s%>, and have no <S%H5117>rest<s%>.
We have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and to the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%>, to be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and are <S%H369>not<s%>; and we have <S%H5445>borne<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
<S%H5650>Servants<s%> have <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over <S%H6561>us<s%>: there is none that does deliver us out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
We <S%H935>get<s%> our <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the peril of our <S%H5315>lives<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.
Our <S%H5785>skin<s%> was <S%H3648>black<s%> like a <S%H8574>oven<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2152>terrible<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%>.
They <S%H6031>ravished<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and the <S%H1330>maids<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
<S%H8269>Princes<s%> are hanged <S%H8518>up<s%> by their <S%H3027>hand<s%>: the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H2205>elders<s%> were not <S%H1921>honored<s%>.
They <S%H5375>took<s%> the young <S%H970>men<s%> to <S%H2911>grind<s%>, and the <S%H5288>sons<s%> <S%H3782>fell<s%> under the <S%H6086>wood<s%>.
The <S%H2205>elders<s%> have <S%H7673>ceased<s%> from the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, the young <S%H970>men<s%> from their <S%H5058>music<s%>.
The <S%H4885>joy<s%> of our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7673>ceased<s%>; our <S%H4234>dance<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H60>mourning<s%>.
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from our <S%H7218>head<s%>: <S%H188>woe<s%> unto <S%H2398>us<s%>, that we have sinned!
For this our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1739>faint<s%>; for these things our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H2821>dim<s%>.
Because of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, which is <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, the <S%H7776>foxes<s%> walk upon <S%H1980>it<s%>.
<S%H3068>You<s%>, O Lord, <S%H3427>remain<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; your <S%H3678>throne<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%>.
Therefore do you <S%H7911>forget<s%> us for <S%H5331>ever<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> us so <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>?
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> us unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, and we shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%>; <S%H2318>renew<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> as of <S%H6924>old<s%>.
But you have <S%H3988>utterly<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3966>us<s%>; you are very angry against <S%H7107>us<s%>.
